title: Patchwork Fragment, 1870–79
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: patchwork of woven pieces
description: Piece of patchwork made from fabrics in small diamond shapes stitched together to create the illusion of cubes. The woven pieces are in stripes, plaids and a few small floral patterns.

tombstone.epitaph:

Technique: patchwork of woven pieces. 1975-39-1.
